rules_text: When this creature enters, exile five cards at random from your graveyard. For each of the cards exiled this way; if its an artifact, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If it’s a land, create a treasure token. If it’s an instant or sorcery, each opponent loses 1 life. And if it’s a planeswalker, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
